name: AXE NO QUESTION
description:
An old doll factory has been cursed by spirits the night of Halloween, and only one can survive. Climb your way through and smash with your mighty axe. No questions.

Game developed by Ashes (tw: @Ashes_gamedev):

-Diego Matilla (ig: @diegomatilla99) - Programmer

-Alejandro Gómez  (ig: @zemzio)- Artist

-Laura Suárez  (ig: @is_a_unknownart)- Artist

-Mario Lois  (tw: @ML_Shad)- Designer

With special thanks to everyone else in the Ashes team.

THANKS FOR PLAYING!

Music: Music Box Theme & Mysterioso March by Kevin Macleod.
